text: tavada ovuhu tama paramadhipati idiriye sitavanu læbu avasthava numba dutuve nam "meya satyaya nove dæ" yi ohu vimasa sitiyi. apage paramadhipatiyanan mata divura pavasamu. (eya) eseya yæyi pavasati. ese nam numbala pratiksepa karamin siti dæ hetuven mema danduvama numbala bhukti vindinu yæyi ohu pavasanu æta
